name: GetProjectMembers
description:
Retrieve members of a specific project.

Fetches the list of members involved in a specific project. Available only for Enterprise plan users with Company Admin role. Requires 'projects:read' scope.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The ID of the organization to which the project belongs.

value_schema.description: The ID of the organization to which the project belongs.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the team associated with the project.

value_schema.description: The ID of the team to which the project belongs.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the project to retrieve its members.

value_schema.description: The ID of the project for which you want to retrieve the list of members.

parameters.name: maximum_results_per_call
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of project members to return per call. Additional results can be accessed via the cursor parameter.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results to return per call. If the number of project members in the response is greater than the limit specified, the response returns the cursor parameter with a value.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: Indicator for the page position in the result set. Leave empty for the first page; use the prior response's cursor for next pages.

value_schema.description: An indicator of the position of a page in the full set of results. To obtain the first page leave it empty. To obtain subsequent pages set it to the value returned in the cursor field of the previous request.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the miro API.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return per call. If the number of project members in the response is greater than the limit specified, the response returns the cursor parameter with a value.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results to return per call. If the number of project members in the response is greater than the limit specified, the response returns the cursor parameter with a value.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: An indicator of the position of a page in the full set of results. To obtain the first page leave it empty. To obtain subsequent pages set it to the value returned in the cursor field of the previous request.

value_schema.description: An indicator of the position of a page in the full set of results. To obtain the first page leave it empty. To obtain subsequent pages set it to the value returned in the cursor field of the previous request.

parameters.name: org_id
parameters.description: The ID of the organization to which the project belongs.

value_schema.description: The ID of the organization to which the project belongs.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: The ID of the team to which the project belongs.

value_schema.description: The ID of the team to which the project belongs.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: The ID of the project for which you want to retrieve the list of members.

value_schema.description: The ID of the project for which you want to retrieve the list of members.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
